Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value that resonates with its high-quality materials and innovative features. Considering its unparalleled nature, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $10000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best value while ensuring you experience the unparalleled benefits this product offers. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
